title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4022.19 - Use of motion pictures
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4022.19 - Use of motion pictures

State Regulations

Motion pictures shall be taken of every race from start
to finish and may be used to aid the stewards in determining any question
within their jurisdiction. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
4022.19

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
